name: RelativeSync
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Relative sync for Movement Parent & Chairs. Requires both users to have the mod installed. Synced over Mod Network.

Provides some Experimental settings to also fix local jitter on movement parents.
changelog:
- Fixed RelativeSyncMarker not generating correct path hash for local player
  - This fixes relative sync on local avatar movement parents
- Fixed initial calculated interpolation interval when assigning a new RelativeSyncMarker for a remote user
  - Would calculate from time was last on a movement parent, which could lead to seconds long interpolation
- Added Network Debug settings
- Added experimental settings to fix **local** jitter on movement parents
  - These options are disabled by default as they have not been heavily tested
